page.title: 17DRAMA GROUP: CROPWELL BUTLER
page.content: The{Botiller Players} is an amateur Dramatic Group formed in 1966 from a foundation of the Cropwell Butler & Tithby Drama class held at the old Village Hall at Cropwell. There is a qualified drama teacher as producer (FLCM, FRSA) & each year 2 productions are staged, one in Spring, and one in Autumn. There are about 20-24 members of all ages from 18 upwards, who come from the surrounding villages. The 3 shows of each production are normally sold out and the audiences number about 120. These productions are enjoyed by everyone, both players and audience. In 1984 the production of "The Curious Savage" won the Trophy awarded by the Nottingham & Notts. Drama Assocociation for the best presentation and the best production of the year.
